author: Peter Sommerfeld
comment: A life saver! This is the best notifier app I have found so far. ONE REQUEST: save/restore option to save all customizations. Would be very useful when switching to a new phone and not having to enter all the custom snooze times etc that I set up

author: James Leo
comment: I rely on this daily for active calendar reminders. Terrific app!

author: Zoltán Erdőkövy
comment: Works well. It would be great if we could customize the look of the alert screen.

author: Larry Hamel
comment: This app helps me miss fewer appointments. Hey, since Android 8, I perceive it can use a lot of battery. Can you double check?

author: Michael Janis
comment: Exactly what I needed to catch all my reminders.

author: Allen
comment: This is a great app -- particularly if you are forgetful as I am. I read some of the bad reviews and without exception I believe folks aren't using it properly. It does not 'take over' and it is not intrusive if you're using it right.  C'mon people -- it's worth the effort to study the settings! I've used it for a couple of years now and it has never disappointed.  I contacted the developer Roberto about giving the option to disable toast messages. Within a few hours he had issued a software update! Now this app is perfect! Thanks Roberto!

I don't see how this is much better than the stock calendar notification. This won't let you pick a ring tone or volume, and the notification tone plays for about half a second. That's certainly not enough to get my attention especially when the phone is in my pocket.

author: Dan Gray
comment: After each update you have to enter the app and click accept. This has made me miss meetings. Can this be removed?

author: Beate Danielsen
comment: Initially this tool worked great, but not so any more. This calendar notifier no longer connects to my Google calendar and provides audible reminders. I can see events in the list with an alarm set, but the alarm never rings. I cannot recommend this tool if you want it to sync with your Google calendar.

author: Ron Heinsman
comment: Stopped working. I have no idea why, but it just stopped setting off any alarms. Not worth anything if it won't sound alarms. Also, why does it ask me to pay for the pro version, but clicking on that icon does nothing? Good idea for an app, but it doesn't work.

author: Sameh Riad
comment: Works well. But don't know why it needs contacts and phone and photo permissions, I denied them and still works well

author: Cheri Turner
comment: Worked exactly once then quit. Useless junk. Maybe developers should offer some assistance. Uninstalling.

author: gunnar karlsson
comment: Would like the ability to remove the dismiss button from the notification. I have mistakenly dismissed the reminder directly from the notification shade by pressing that button.

author: Kabal Nolast
comment: There are no notifications happening. What is this app supposed to do, because it's not doing anything

author: Kaibosh
comment: For anyone having issues with the app suddenly not working, ensure that it's excluded from the automatic power saving/management feature of your phone..

author: Kartik Jayan
comment: Excellent calendar-related snooze app that seamlessly links to the Calendar app in Android! Easy to snooze reminder for any amount of time - for a day or a month!

author: Vlad Gutkovsky
comment: Pretty much perfect, fastest decision ever to upgrade to Pro.

author: Wayne Whiting
comment: App has one use - to take over calendar alerts unfortunately it worked for one day and then just stopped - uninstall.

author: Ray C
comment: Lots of settings, but once you get it set up, it works great!

author: Andy Lawson
comment: Does exactly what I needed. Calendar notifications now actually remind me to do stuff! Thanks!

author: sly Co
comment: Alerts now no longer working.

author: house Paddy
comment: Great app. Does exactly what I need. I upgraded to nougat, and my previous event had not been updated since 2012. This one works as expected. I even found a bug, and reported it to the developer. Dev fixed it in a few days.

author: Mark Taylor
comment: Like others, it was all too easy to miss Google Calendar reminders. This app is a lifesaver, and ensures that I always get those reminders. Couldn't live without it!

author: KAB HHD
comment: Turned out utterly useless. Doesn't pick up any other tones than a set of specific once. A lot of fundamental features disabled and prompted to by pro version. There are 100s of other alternatives.

author: Andrew Duren
comment: App crashes each time I dismiss a notification. Note 7.
title: Crashes

author: Michelle Taylor
comment: Stopped working as soon as I did my test all of my events disappeared

author: Sumit Prasad
comment: Trigger every alarm... you never miss appointment, reminder..thanks
title: Nice app

author: Gene Noble
comment: The best notifier/reminder app on the market. Worth the $2.50.

author: yeswanth gantasala
comment: I have tried a lot of remainder apps, but this is the best one with all features u need. Once marshmallow update came, my old remainder app became abnormal and unreliable. Once I have analysed this for an hour I just bought the paid version too for supporting further developments.  Till now no bugs noted, using moto x play with 6.02. A big thanks and appreciation to the developer.
title: Dream app I have been looking for...

author: Sajit Vasudevan
comment: You will not miss a single event in calendar
title: Very good app

author: SOMTV Entertainment
comment: Good
title: AbdouraZak

author: Liviu Sas
comment: Awesome app! No more missed meeting any more :)  Would be great if it could recognize when there is a phone number in the location field and open the dialer instead of google maps :)  In my case, most of the numbers contain a conference bridge number and pin. Would be great if those could also be recognized :)

author: Mike Hawryluk
comment: It's a fantastic app for those with lots of meetings. I never miss a meeting since installing it.

author: Steve T.
comment: Great app and great developer

author: Greg Widener
comment: 4/21/16 update: Best communicating developer I've worked with. Had an issue with my S7 Edge playing sound when set to silent and not vibrating on vibrate mode. Developer worked until he got it corrected. This is the best notifier app in the Play Store!  THANK YOU! This is perfect. Was using the old, ugly Calendar Snooze and looking for a replacement that works on Marshmallow. Very pleased with this app and will recommend to friends!

author: Ryan Partington
comment: But this app has changed my life, no more missed calendar events which I basically use to arrange my whole life
title: Don't want to sound over dramatic

author: Mohammad Risha Raditya
comment: Bad UX

author: Ron Jarrah
comment: How anyone can give this app less than 5 stars is beyond me. It fills the most basic gap in the OS by beautifully handling notifications from your existing calendar. A MUST HAVE!
title: Best APP in all of Google Play

author: elisha chimbera
comment: Lb
title: Ufcs

author: Rui Da Costa
comment: Solid app. I love the wear integration and the constant updates and tweaks. Dev really cares about a quality experience.
